attributes.action: Ensure every security-guard, utility & commercial vehicle driver details held on National DNA Database
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Security-guards, utility & commercial vehicle drivers should have DNA, finger & palm-prints, photograph [JPEG], signature... details held in perpetuity on secure government servers.

Thieves, terrorists... may be denied entry to buildings, vehicles... if they red-flag simple checks.

Car-dealership employed career-criminals & was unsurprisingly robbed; 'security guards' claimed they were 'over-powered'.

Terrorists gaining access to utility, delivery... vehicles may be waved-through to your place of work; preventing access is critical.
